text: Ani jara tumacyavara allahaci daya-krpa rahili nasati, tara tyancya eka gatane tumhala margabhrasta karanyace karasthana racale hote, parantu te svatahlaca margabhrasta karatata ani te tumhala kahica nukasana pohacavu sakata nahi ani allahane tumacyavara grantha ani jnana utaravile ahe ani tumhi je janata navhate te jnana pradana kele ahe ani tumacyavara allahaci phara mothi krpa ahe
